src:
REZZIME DANA (ponedeljak): Slavlje u Nemačkoj i na severu, tuga u Italiji i Francuskoj
Pogledajte ko vam je 4. novembra doneo novac, a ko vas je prodao...

04 Nov 2019

NAPOMENA: U rubrici REZZIME DANA novinari portala MOZZART Sport koriste podatke kladionice MOZZART o najigranijim parovima tog dana, i na osnovu toga sumiraju koji su od najigranijih tipova prošli, a koji nisu.
OVDE pogledajte kako smo mi prošli u rubrici PREDLOZZI I TIPOVANJA.
Evo kako ste vi tipovali...

ZAOKRUŽENO

BOHUM - NIRNBERG (tip tgg gg, kvota 1,57) - rezultat 3:1Sjajno prvo poluvreme Bohuma za beg iz opasne zone. Popularni klub iz rurske oblasti je vrednim trijumfom nad Nirnbergom od 3:1 najavio pohod ka sredini tabele koja mu je na samo tri boda, iako ne igra u skladu sa očekivanjima od početka sezone. Samo dve pobede na poslednjih deset utakmica u Cvajti imaju igrači Bohuma, ali je dolazak novog trenera Tomasa Rejsa definitivno pokrenuo stvari u gradu o kojem prelepo peva Herbert Grenemajer. Vama je najbitnije da su oba tima postigla po gol. IZVEŠTAJ.
LOKOMOTIVA ZAGREB - VARAŽDIN (tip 1, kvota 1,35) - rezultat 2:1Fenjeraš Varaždin namučio je Lokomotivu iz Zagreba, ali ništa više od toga. Domaćin je uspeo da upiše veoma važnu pobedu na zatvaranju kola u hrvatskom šampionatu, te da se izjednači sa Rijekom po broju bodova na tabeli. Pobedu domaći doneli su Tolić i Tuci, dok je Glavina pokušao da vam pokvari slavlje pogotkom za Varaždin. Nije uspeo, a vi ste mogli da zaokružite prolaz.
SILKEBORG - BRONDBI (tip 2, kvota 1,62) - rezultat 0:1Jedan, ali vredan gol za četvrtu vezanu pobedu Brondbija i vaš dobitak! Fenjeraš Silkeborg danas je pružio dostojan otpor znatno poznatijem i slavnijem danskom timu, ali uspeo je samo "časno" da izgubi - minimalcem. Jedini pogodak na meču postigao je Heldund u 14. minutu utakmice i tako nagovestio da bi ova sezona mogla da bude daleko bolja za Brondbi od prethodne.
OD GRENLAND - MJONDALEN (tip 1, kvota 1,50) - rezultat 3:2Dobitak u Norveškoj za koji možete da se zahvalite isključivo Torgiru Bovenu. Sjajni napadač domaće ekipe postigao je het-trik i vodio je svoju ekipu do preokreta protiv veoma žilavog Mjondalena. Dva puta su gosti vodili na ovom susretu, ali je Boven uspeo da golovima u 78. i 84. minutu donese Odu važne bodove u borbi za Ligu Evrope.
DUIZBURG - URDINGEN (tip 1, kvota 1,95) - rezultat 2:0Na utakmici iz trećeg ranga Nemačke gotovo da se niste ni nervirali. Duizburg je gotovo rutinski savladao Urdingen na svom terenu i ponovo izbio na čelo tabele. Domaćin je poveo već u 22. minutu preko Dahnera, a Mikels je u nadoknadi prvog dela povećao na 2:0. Ispostavilo se da je to konačan rezultat, iako je domaćin mogao do još kojeg gola.
STOUK - VBA (tip 2, kvota 2,40) - rezultat 0:2Mnogi iz šale kažu da je najteže odneti bodove na kišnoj večeri u Stouku. Ali tako nije mislio Vest Bromvič Albion, koji je samo dodatno produbio letargiju koja inače vlada kod nekadašnjeg Premijerligaša, koji se trenutno nalazi zakucan za samo dno tabele u Čempionšipu sa samo osam osvojenih bodova. Tim Slavena Bilića je do prvog pogotka došao još u 8. minutu preko Filipsa, da bi rivala potpuno dokrajčio Hal Robson-Kanu golom iz penala sredinom drugog poluvremena. Lep dobitak na vašim tiketima.

PRECRTANO

SPAL - SAMPDORIJA (tip 1, kvota 2,45) - rezultat 0:1U meču dva najlošija tima pred početak kola u Seriji A, trijumfovao je onaj koji je bio slabije pozicioniran na tabeli i to u prvom minutu nadoknade drugog poluvremena. Veoma tvrda i za publiku neinteresantna utakmica odigrana je u Italiji, a epilog je takav da je Spal na kraju morao da "pokupi" fenjer. Kaprari je na teren ušao u 90. minutu, nekih 60 sekundi kasnije postigao gol i obavio svoj posao, a vama pokvario veče. IZVEŠTAJ.
ZLIN - PLZENJ (tip 2, kvota 1,60) - rezultat 1:1Neprijatan kiks Plzenja na meču na kojem je dvojka bila sasvim realna. Domaćin je bio u katastrofalnoj seriji rezultata pred ovu utakmicu, ali je uspeo da iznenadi drugoplasirani tim na tabeli, Plzenj i tako dodatno obraduje sve navijače i fudbalere praške Slavije, koja se sada nalazi 11 bodova ispred prvih pratilaca na tabeli. Za vas, raspoloženje je bilo daleko od idealnog nakon ovog meča. Krmenčik je doveo gosta u prednost u 72. minutu, a Vagner je izjednačio sedam minuta kasnije. Šteta.
AJAKS II - VOLENDAM (tip 1, kvota 1,45) - rezultat 1:3Neprijatno iznenađenje u drugoj ligi Holandije. Nadali ste se da će mladi tim Ajaksa uspeti da uzme meru Volendamu, ali desilo se nešto potpuno suprotno. Da sve bude gore, nada je tinjala čitavo prvo poluvreme, ali je onda ugašena u nastavku. Dodeman je u 50. minutu doveo goste u vodstvo, a prednost je duplirao Tol samo devet minuta kasnije. Nadu da bi moglo da se desi čudo dao je Gravenberh u 73. minutu, ali je Antonući u nadoknadi samo potvrdio ono što je bilo jasno od starta.
AVR - NANSI (tip 1, kvota 2,60) - rezultat 1:1Malo je nedostajalo da na ovom meču vidimo keca, ali je na vašu veliku žalost ipak došao "iks". Avr je vodio protiv Nansija golom Kadeverea u 39. minutu iz penala, a njega možete da krivite što još jednom nije zatresao mrežu gosta 15 minuta ranije, takođe iz jedanaesterca. Ovako, kazna je stigla u 62. minutu, opet iz penala preko Vagnera i lep kec je "propao".
text:
DAILY SUMMARY (Monday): Celebration in Germany and North, Sadness in Italy and France
Look who brought you money on November 4 and who sold you ...

04 Nov 2019

NOTE: In the DAY SUMMARY section, MOZZART Sport reporters use the MOZZART bookmakers' data on the most played pairs of the day, summarizing which of the most played types have passed and which have not.
See here how we went in the PROPOSALS AND TYPES section.
Here's how you guys typed ...

ROUNDED

BOHUM - NIRNBERG (type tgg gg, odds 1.57) - Score 3: 1Great first half Bohum to escape from the danger zone. The popular club from the Ruhr area has announced a worthy triumph over Nuremberg 3-1 to hike towards the middle of the table, which is only three points away, although it does not play as expected from the beginning of the season. Bochum's players have only won two of their last ten games at Zweite, but the arrival of new coach Thomas Reis has definitely set things in motion in a town that is beautifully sung by Herbert Grenemaier. What matters most to you is that both teams have scored goals. REPORT.
LOCOMOTIVE ZAGREB - VARAŽDIN (type 1, odds 1,35) - result 2: 1Fenaras Varazdin tormented Lokomotiva from Zagreb, but nothing more. The host managed to record a very important victory in the closing of the car in the Croatian championship, and to equalize with Rijeka by the number of points on the table. The victory was won by Tolic and Tucci, while Glavina tried to spoil your celebration with a goal for Varazdin. It failed, and you were able to round the aisle.
SILKEBORG - BRONDBY (tip 2, odds 1,62) - Score 0: 1One but worth a goal for Brondby's fourth tied win and your winnings! The Silkeborg lantern today gave a worthy resistance to the much more famous and famous Danish team, but managed to only "honorably" lose - with minimal. The only goal of the match was scored by Heldund in the 14th minute of the match, suggesting that this season could be far better for Brondby than the previous one.
FROM GREENLAND - MJONDALEN (type 1, odds 1.50) - Score 3: 2Works in Norway for which you can only thank Tergir Boven. A great striker from the home team scored the hat trick and led his team to the turn against a very tough Mjondalen. Twice the guests led in this match, but Boven managed to give Ode important points in the 78th and 84th minutes in the fight for the Europa League.
DUISBURG - URDINGEN (tip 1, odds 1,95) - result 2: 0 In the third ranked match in Germany you almost never got nervous. Duisburg almost routinely defeated Urdingen at home and broke out at the head of the table again. The home side led already in the 22nd minute via Dahner, and Mikels increased the lead to 2-0. It turned out to be the final result, although the home side could have scored another goal.
STOUK - WBA (Type 2, odds 2.40) - Score 0: 2 Many jokingly say that the hardest thing to do is score on a rainy night in Stoke. But that's not what West Bromwich Albion thought, which only further deepened the lethargy that normally prevails in the former Premier League, which is currently pinned to the bottom of the Championship table with only eight points. Slaven Bilic's team reached the first goal in the 8th minute via Phillips, to rival Hal Robson-Kana completely with a penalty kick midway through the second half. Nice winnings on your tickets.

PRECRTANO

SPAL - SAMPDORIA (Type 1, odds 2.45) - Score 0: 1The match between the two worst teams before the start of the Serie A round was triumphant in the first half of the second half. A very hard and uninteresting match for the audience was played in Italy, and the epilogue is such that Spal eventually had to "pick up" the lantern. Caprari took the field in the 90th minute, some 60 seconds later scored a goal and did his job and ruined your evening. REPORT.
ZLIN - PLZENJ (type 2, odds 1,60) - result 1: 1Annoying creep of Plzen in a match in which the pair was quite realistic. The home side were in a disastrous series of results before this game, but managed to surprise the second-ranked team in the standings, Plzen, and thus further cheer all the fans and footballers of the Prague Slavia, which is now 11 points ahead of the first followers on the table. For you, the mood was far from ideal after this match. Kremenchik put the visitors ahead in the 72nd minute and Wagner equalized seven minutes later. Too bad.
AJAKS II - VOLENDAM (tip 1, odds 1,45) - result 1: 3Unpleasant surprise in the second league of the Netherlands. You hoped Ajax's young team would manage to take Volendam's measure, but something completely opposite happened. To make matters worse, hope was smoldering throughout the first half, but then was extinguished below. Dodeman led the visitors in the 50th minute, with the advantage doubling Tol only nine minutes later. The hope that a miracle could happen was given by Gravenberh in the 73rd minute, but Antonucci in compensation only confirmed what was clear from the start.
AVR - NANSI (Type 1, odds 2.60) - Score 1: 1 It was a little lacking to see an ace in this match, but to your great regret the "X" came. Avr led against Nancy with a goal from Kadevere in the 39th minute from penalty, and you can blame him for not once again shaking the visitors net 15 minutes earlier, also from a penalty. Thus, the penalty came in the 62nd minute, again from a penalty shot over Wagner and a nice ace "failed".
